adrFormatAddress: 114 E 61st St, New York, NY 10065-8102, USA

originalText.text: I can confidently say that Dr. Sharon Giese is an expert in face filler procedures. From the moment I stepped into her beautiful office, I was greeted by her warm and attentive staff who made me feel comfortable. Dr. Giese took the time to listen to my concerns and desires and demonstrated skill and precision during the procedure (with no pain). The outcome is subtle and natural and restores the youthful appearance I was looking for. I know there are many options out there, and I’m happy I chose Dr. Giese to help me look and feel great!

originalText.text: Best plastic surgeon I have ever.been to in my life . Bedside manner is amazing and her staff are all very friendly and personable. With Dr G you get quality work and most importantly she is a doctor first that puts your health first !

text.text: Best plastic surgeon I have ever.been to in my life . Bedside manner is amazing and her staff are all very friendly and personable. With Dr G you get quality work and most importantly she is a doctor first that puts your health first !

originalText.text: Any procedure can be stressful but Dr Giese’s confidence and expertise made me feel very comfortable and at ease. The outcome far exceeded my expectations!! She is absolutely brilliant!! I am beyond thrilled! The entire staff from office manager, Brenda was knowledgeable and attentive. My nurses- Meg, was thorough and sweet. And, Justin was caring and funny. The anesthesiologist Dr Tosi was very warm and comforting.The facility was immaculate and beautiful! Although  I live in Los Angeles with many Drs I will only return to Dr Giese for any medical treatments. You feel like part of the family here. Much love ❤️

originalText.text: Dr. Giese is AMAZING!! I went to her for my first breast implants, had to be replaced after 17 years. She did an excellent  job then and  excellent job now. I'm so extremely happy, they look beautiful! No bruising and barely any pain.  I'm soo... happy!! Staff is Incredible and sweet! They took their time to explain and even show me what my new implants would look like. I also want to thank Megan, you rock!! Thank you all so much!!

They took their time to explain and even show me what my new implants would look like. I also want to thank Megan, you rock!! Thank you all so much!!

originalText.text: As a health professional and someone who interprets treatment from a more critical perspective, Dr. Giese is a practitioner extraordinaire. She takes the time to explain procedures in detail affording me the opportunity to ask numerous questions if necessary. Her commitment to her patients is without equal and because of this, without hesitation I feel very comfortable referring family and friends to her practice. On a personal level, I find her to be a compassionate surgeon, one of the few doctors who actually listen to her patients. Over the past 20 years I have know her ethical standards and professionalism to be exemplary.
